I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.

i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

content.text: Hi there, I'm interested in hearing about your favorite local hangouts.
I really like going to my local sushi bar. It's always fresh and delicious, and the staff is really friendly.
Awesome, I love sushi! What's your favorite roll?
I'm a big fan of the California roll. It's the perfect balance of flavors and textures.
Sounds delicious! I'm definitely going to have to check that out.
You should! It's my favorite place to eat.
I'm also interested in hearing about your favorite pastimes.
I love to play basketball. It's a great way to stay active and have fun.
That's awesome! I used to play basketball a lot when I was younger.
Me too! I played in high school and college.
That's great! I wish I had kept playing.
You should start again! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! I've been thinking about getting back into shape.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
